price: (Ergamtoonnis) “Rabbiin keenya ni beeka nuti gara keessanitti ergamoodha” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
